description:
Kyo died young before a treatment could be found for his disease, but Ryo wished him back into being when she became a God candidate. Now Kyo has full control of the parallel worlds Ryo creates, and he asks Goro to help him establish a utopia for her.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Mada Bokura made, Hikari ga Todoite Inainda
The Light Hasn`t Reached Us Yet
まだ僕らまで, 光が届いていないんだ
